an2.141-150:4.3: A gift of material things and a gift of the teaching.
an2.141-150:4.5: The better of these two gifts is the gift of the teaching.”
an2.141-150:6.3: An offering of material things and an offering of the teaching.
an2.141-150:6.5: The better of these two offerings is an offering of the teaching.”
an2.141-150:8.1: “There are these two acts of generosity.
an2.141-150:8.3: Generosity with material things and generosity with the teaching.
an2.141-150:8.4: These are the two acts of generosity.
an2.141-150:8.5: The better of these two acts of generosity is generosity with the teaching.”
an2.141-150:10.3: Donation of material things and donation of the teaching.
an2.141-150:10.5: The better of these two donations is a donation of the teaching.”
an2.141-150:12.3: Riches in material things and riches in the teaching.
an2.141-150:12.5: The better of these two riches is the riches of the teaching.”
an2.141-150:14.1: “There are these two kinds of enjoyment.
an2.141-150:14.3: Enjoyment of material things and enjoyment of the teaching.
an2.141-150:14.4: These are the two kinds of enjoyment.
an2.141-150:14.5: The better of these two kinds of enjoyment is the enjoyment of the teaching.”
an2.141-150:16.1: “There are these two kinds of sharing.
an2.141-150:16.3: Sharing material things and sharing the teaching.
an2.141-150:16.4: These are the two kinds of sharing.
an2.141-150:16.5: The better of these two kinds of sharing is the sharing of the teaching.”
an2.141-150:18.1: “There are these two kinds of inclusion.
an2.141-150:18.3: Inclusion in material things and inclusion in the teaching.
an2.141-150:18.4: These are the two kinds of inclusion.
an2.141-150:18.5: The better of these two kinds of inclusion is inclusion in the teaching.”
an2.141-150:20.1: “There are these two kinds of support.
an2.141-150:20.3: Support in material things and support in the teaching.
an2.141-150:20.4: These are the two kinds of support.
an2.141-150:20.5: The better of these two kinds of support is support in the teaching.”
an2.141-150:22.1: “There are these two kinds of sympathy.
an2.141-150:22.3: Sympathy in material things and sympathy in the teaching.
an2.141-150:22.4: These are the two kinds of sympathy.
an2.141-150:22.5: The better of these two kinds of sympathy is sympathy in the teaching.”
